summary.span: 返回表示此矩阵的字符串。

span.span: Returns a string that represents this matrix.

returns.span: 此矩阵的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of this matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用当前区域性的约定设置格式的数值返回的字符串中。The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. 例如，对于 EN-US 区域性，返回的字符串可能显示为`{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2} }`。For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2} }`.
